body.p: Excuse me if I presume to urge upon you the pardon of Colo Franklin Gorin, before trial on an indictment for maliciously shooting W C. Wood, Esqr.
I have the known the Colo for many a year, & am sure he never did shoot Mr. Wood maliciously -- The Colo is earnestly loyal, excitable, but kind generous & noble.
The cordially prays upon him & I. See its. Indded all his friends see it, & no one regrets the act more than he does. Allow me to ask, therefore, Your Kind interference.

I have the honor to be,
Very res,
Yr obt Sevt,
Hamilton Pope

His Excellency,
Gov Bramlette,
Frankfort,
Ky
